author: pebblefan.com

changelog.release_notes:
Do you know today is which Constellation? We add Constellation now. You can select use Constellation Icon instead of Bluetooth icon, and it also disappear or appear when bluetooth disconnect or not connect.

你知道今天的是什么星座么？我们现在提供12星座的显示，同时可以表示蓝牙的通断状态。
Change to use more clear and beautiful bold font

1、Improve auto get weather function
2、Add Shake Sensitivity option in setting page

1、自动更新天气功能强化
2、添加晃动灵敏度调整选项

You can custom watchface elements color now! Just choose what you like!

你可以自由的设置元素的颜色了，选你最喜欢的搭配吧！

Add support for Pebble 2

加入Pebble 2支持

Add language Português

添加葡萄牙语支持

Fix timing vibrate not work bug

修复定时震动提醒不工作的问题

Add Italiano language support

加入意大利语支持

Add language Deutsch, Français support include settings page

加入德语和法语支持，包括设置页面

Add language Español support
加入西班牙语支持

improve memory use and battery
when not show health will not start background worker

内存优化和电量优化
不显示健康时不会启动后台

Add Chinese lunar setting for Chinese user
中秋节前添加农历和节日显示
Just a start, more features will come soon!

description:
Now supports (Include setting page) - English, 中文, Español, Deutsch, Français, Italiano

Galaxy Stone is a premium watchface that include fantasy style and many new features.

The watchface includes the following features, all of which can be disabled/enabled as you please.

--The perfect combination of traditional and smart watch's advantages, see time is easy.
--Support Health Fitness Tracking for all pebble watch models, include pebble, pebble steel, pebble time, time steel, time round, pebble 2, pebble time 2 ...
--You can get weather by current location or specify city name in setting page.
--You can select different weather source, current include OpenWeatherMap, Yahoo Weather, Chinese Weather.
--Show three days weather forecast information only need shake your wrist.
--Battery level indicator
--Bluetooth disconnection and vibration
--Timing vibration by setting (hourly, 45/40/30 minutes)
--Not timing vibration time period support
--You can choose different color style
-- Show today Constellation

This is only a start, we will continue add new features soon!

Please click the heart if you like it! 

Thank you!

这款作品名叫“银河石”，她采用了独特的圆环和小球设计，分钟和秒钟的位置像机械手表一样变化，同时巧妙的加入了数字显示，让您对时间了然于胸！

能够同时显示日期、星座、今日天气、后3天天气、温度、空气质量、健康、蓝牙、电量等多种指数，同时可以对任意指数进行开关。

同时本作品对布局和表达方式都进行了新的尝试！

如果您喜欢请强烈点赞红星！

latest_release.release_notes:
Do you know today is which Constellation? We add Constellation now. You can select use Constellation Icon instead of Bluetooth icon, and it also disappear or appear when bluetooth disconnect or not connect.

你知道今天的是什么星座么？我们现在提供12星座的显示，同时可以表示蓝牙的通断状态。

title: Galaxy Stone 银河石
